issue.title: roslaunch not working properly when using enviroment variables

content.raw:
@wjwwood @dirk-thomas quick question: is roslaunch ignoring or cleaning any bash variable defined in .bashrc or using export?

Long version:  if I export a BASH variable (GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH) in my .bashrc or using export directly in the bash command line and after that I use `roslaunch` to invoke gazebo, looks like gazebo is ignoring the value of that variable.
content.html:
@wjwwood @dirk-thomas quick question: is roslaunch ignoring or cleaning any bash variable defined in .bashrc or using export?

Long version: if I export a BASH variable (GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH) in my .bashrc or using export directly in the bash command line and after that I use roslaunch to invoke gazebo, looks like gazebo is ignoring the value of that variable.
